pages.text: 37|52|‘se balata, 'tumi ki tadera antarbhuka yara bisbasa kare ye
37|53|‘Amara yakhana mare yaba ebam amara mati o asthite parinata haba takhana'o ki amaderake pratiphala deya habe?’
37|54|Allah‌ balabena, 'tomara ki take dekhate ca'o?’
37|55|Atahpara se jhumke dekhabe ebam take dekhate pabe jahannamera madhyasthale
37|56|balabe, ‘allahara kasama! Tumi to amake praya dhbansa'i karechile
37|57|amara rabera anugraha na thakale ami'o to hayirakrta [1] byaktidera madhye samila hatama.
37|58|Amadera to ara mrtyu habe na
37|59|prathama mrtyura para ebam amaderake sasti'o deya habe na
37|60|eta to abasya'i mahasaphalya.
37|61|Erupa saphalyera jan'ya amalakaridera ucita amala kara
37|62|apyayanera jan'ya ki eta'i sreya, na yakkuma gacha
37|63|yalimadera jan'ya amara eta srsti karechi pariksasbarupa
37|64|e gacha ud‌gata haya jahannamera taladesa theke
37|65|era moca yena sayatanera matha
37|66|tara to eta theke khabe ebam udara purna karabe eta diye [1].
37|67|Tadupari tadera jan'ya thakabe phutanta panira misrana.
37|68|Tarapara tadera pratyabartana habe prajbalita agunera'i dike.
37|69|Tara to tadera pitrpurusaderake peyechila bipathagami
37|70|atahpara tadera padanka anusarane dhabita hayechila [1].
37|71|Ara abasya'i tadera age purbabatidera besira bhaga bipathagami hayechila
37|72|ara abasya'i amara tadera madhye satarkakari pathiyechilama.
37|73|Kaje'i laksya karuna yaderake satarka kara hayechila, tadera parinama ki hayechila
37|74|tabe allahara ekanistha bandadera katha sbatantra [1].
37|75|Ara abasya'i nuha amaderake dekechilena, atahpara (dekhuna) amara kata uttama saradanakari.
37|76|Ara take ebam tara paribarabargake amara ud'dhara karechilama mahasankata theke.
